Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute at Archer/Cicero
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Cicero, 55th, Central & Archer: due to, street blockage near Archer/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Archer, Cicero, 55th, Central, then resume their normal route on Archer: due to street blockage near Archer/Cicero.

Allow extra travel time.
